code: import React from'react';import{FaPlus,FaTrashCan}from'react-icons/fa6';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{addOption,delOption,setOption}from'../../redux/reducers/questionsReducer';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Choosequestion=function Choosequestion(_ref){var id=_ref.id;var dispatch=useDispatch();var questions=useSelector(function(state){return state.questions.items;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:questions[id].options.map(function(option,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row choose-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-lg-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputitem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"basic-url",className:"form-label",children:"Option"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:option,onChange:function onChange(e){dispatch(setOption({id:id,i:i,option:e.target.value}));},className:" item mt-3"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-4",id:"answer-icons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTrashCan,{onClick:function onClick(e){dispatch(delOption({id:id,i:i}));},className:"icon"}),questions[id].options.length==i+1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaPlus,{onClick:function onClick(e){dispatch(addOption({id:id}));},className:"icon plus"})]})]});})});};export default Choosequestion;
